html: Straw. People of the most perverse tempers shall become mild by the influence of the gospel, and shall dwell together in perfect concord. (Calmet)—Food, according to the sentence, Genesis iii. 14. (Menochius)— The devil's power is abridged, chap. xi. 6. (Calmet)— The proudest Gentiles are converted, and adopt the mild manners of Christians, in fasting and mortification. (Worthington)
